# Public frontend talking to backend API
NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=https://api.zuzakami.co.za

# Public verification URLs (what we embed in QR codes)
NEXT_PUBLIC_PUBLIC_VERIFY_URL=https://verify.zuzakami.co.za/public/verify
NEXT_PUBLIC_PUBLIC_VERIFY_TOKEN_URL=https://verify.zuzakami.co.za/public/verify-token
